sourcesContent:
<template>
<v-dialog d-flex elevation="0" v-model="show" width="1000px" height="500px">
    <v-card class=" flex-wrap text-justify justify-space-between">
        <v-card-title class="headline font-weight-bold">Maximum Topics Reached </v-card-title>
        <v-divider />
        <v-card-title class="subheading">
            Whoops! Up to 5 topics may be selected at once. 
        </v-card-title>
        <v-card-title class="subheading"> 
                    You can edit your selection from the Trends page
        </v-card-title>
        <v-divider />
        


        <v-divider />
        <v-card-actions>
            <v-row dense>
            <v-spacer/>
                <v-btn  rounded depressed @click.stop="close">
                    Close
                </v-btn>
            </v-row>
        </v-card-actions>
    </v-card>

</v-dialog>
</template>

<script>


export default {
    props: {
        value: Boolean
    },

    computed: {
       

        show: {
            get() {
                return this.value
            },
            set(value) {
                this.$emit('input', value)
            }
        }
    },
    methods: {

        close() {
            this.show = false
            this.closeTopic()
        },
        replace(topic) {
            this.removeSelected(topic)
            this.addSelected(this.current_topic)
            this.close()
        }
    },

    data: () => ({
    }),


}
</script>

<style scoped>
.v-list-item {
    justify-content: center !important;
    flex-direction: row !important;
    text-align: center !important;
    align-items: center !important;
}

.item {
    background: rgb(230, 235, 255);
}

.remove {
    background: rgb(230, 235, 255);
}
.remove:hover {
     background:rgb(255, 222, 222);

}


</style>
